remarks: A Hilbert lattice has the superposition and exchange properties. (Contributed by NM, 13-Nov-2011.)
statement:
hlsuprexch.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
hlsuprexch.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
hlsuprexch.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
hlsuprexch.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
hlsuprexch $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) -> ( ( P =/= Q -> E. z e. A ( z =/= P /\ z =/= Q /\ z .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) ) /\ A. z e. B ( ( -. P .<_ z /\ P .<_ ( z .\/ Q ) ) -> Q .<_ ( z .\/ P ) ) ) ) $.
$d A z $.
$d B z $.
$d K z $.
$d P z $.
$d Q z $.
